Replace.Text: In friendly territory, civilian units and combat units have +3 speed [ICON_Movement] and 1 speed [ICON_Movement] respectively. Civilian units ignore terrain movement debuffs.

Mining, animal husbandry, and pottery are unlocked at the beginning. [NEWLINE]The answer is yes, this heart is beating deep in steel. What we need to do is to be like warm rain, gradually making the future better. With a new world, a new life, and new neighbors. The struggle is over, and now comes...the search for happiness.
Mining, animal husbandry, and pottery are unlocked at the beginning.
Hello, my name is Tantra. I arrived here following the signal sent by the experimental machine that exists in this world.
Whenever new era technology is unlocked, citizens provide 1 hammer of [ICON_Production] and 1 bottle of [ICON_Science].
Special item, academy unlock, 50 hammers, limited to 3 times. Reward 2 technologies that can currently be researched. If it is in the golden age, it will provide an additional regional slot.
Has a special governor: Isabelle, the searching magician

Special rider, does not consume strategic resources, has a very low cost, has higher mobility [ICON_MOVEMENT] but lower combat power [ICON_STRENGTH], and provides 5 combat power [ICON_STRENGTH] to adjacent units (can be superimposed). Ignoring the hilly movement debuff, you can build roads, fortresses, mountain tunnels and nuclear bomb silos, 3 labor.
The dragon roars in the sky
I am steel. However, there is a mind within the body. If you want to steal my heart...or trample it...[NEWLINE]I will rebel against the world.
Limited to 3 times. Provides 2 technologies. If it is in the golden age, an additional area slot will be added.

Special rider, cheap to build, faster but weaker, adds 5 strength to adjacent units (can be stacked). Can build roads, fortresses, tunnels through mountains and nuclear bomb silos, 3 labor, ignores the hilly mobility debuff.
Add 5 attack power from adjacent units' mind-holding machines.
Civilian units ignore terrain and gain +3 speed in friendly territory. [NEWLINE] Military unit friendly territory increases speed by 1[NEWLINE]
Can add 5 power to adjacent units (can be superimposed)
Cities within 9 blocks receive 3 [ICON_Science] bottles and 3 [ICON_Production] hammers

The construction of military camp [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] or military camp building is accelerated by 50%. For every military camp [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] or military camp building in this city, the city within 9 blocks will receive 2 hammers [ICON_Production]

The construction of a college [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] or college building is accelerated by 50%. For every college [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] or college building in this city, the city within 9 blocks will get 2 bottles of [ICON_Science]
For each of your cities within 9 cells, this city will receive 5% bottle [ICON_Science] and 5% hammer [ICON_Production].
The project is accelerated by 100%. When the number of players is less than or equal to 6, nuclear fission technology is unlocked, providing 10 uranium points per round [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM]
All military units have +3 speed [ICON_Movement], and the production units in this city gain 75% of the cultural value [ICON_Culture] that consumes productivity [ICON_Production].

"In magic, there is no ultimate that has no end" is actually a law. [NEWLINE]But with the spells of Elena and Tantera, coupled with my increase, I dare to hold my head high and say, this is my ultimate now!
ââSummon transmission from Eyalon, successful [NEWLINE]Welcome to a distant and alien land... No, that's not right. I'm so happy to meet you again. My dearly missed compatriots.

Production speed and construction speed are increased by 100%. Each time a strategic resource is unlocked, some units are given as a gift. Each level of the unit increases by +2 [ICON_Strength] and 1 [ICON_Movement] speed.
2 special items, unlocking the military camp, stimulating 1 and blasting enhancement 9, giving units as gifts.
Yuan Gun Gun No. 1 and Yuan Gun Gun No. 2 made by Aniel. [NEWLINE]Yuangungun No. 1 was damaged while protecting An Nier. After the protest, Aniel remade Yuan Gun Gun 2
Has the characteristic governor undead girl Luna

This heart... is definitely not just filled with fear. In order to do what I want to do, I have to muster the courage and courage. I want to reach out to the children in this world that has stopped functioning right now. I want to tell them that you are not trash...

The last "heart-holding machine" made by Belfort himself - he gave up because he was too disappointed with the "heart". It is the sister of Mono and Tantra and has the highest performance. The creator's disdain made Aniel feel very inferior. . Because of his fear of strangers and low self-esteem, he rarely leaves the dump of discarded parts. With his only friend, the machine [Yuangungun No. 1], he lived a life where only the two of them lived together. Cherish Mono and Tantra more than anything else...
400 hammers, give away an archer, a spearman, a rider, a chariot, a stone crossbow, and a battering ram. An ancient general.

1800 hammers, giving away a spear phalanx, a drone, a helicopter, a tank, a machine gun, a cannon, and one each of various great men (except the great prophet), 2 supply convoys, 1 point of aluminum and 2 points of oil per round.

Featured Scout. It has an additional vision, 1 movement speed, 1 initial promotion, ignores terrain movement debuffs, and +10 strength [ICON_Strength] when fighting barbarians. Add 10 strength [ICON_Strength] when defending.

Featured Spearmen, Engineering Unlocked. Has 1 initial promotion, 90 hammers [ICON_Production], 3 movement speed [ICON_Movement], and ignores area control. Add 10 strength when defending. Increase blood recovery by 10 when out of combat.

A misfortune that cannot be accommodated by a young body. Unacceptable separation and loneliness. The rejection that closes the heart may be the trouble of loving parents. The small steps finally meet the sunshine that guides each other. The girl obsessed with death is learning, and her love is resurrected
Can you be friends with me?
If the units produced in this city do not have a free promotion initially, they will receive a free promotion.
All units: Each adjacent unit adds 2 strength.

The city's total production will be increased by 20%. If Luna is in the capital, each burned city will be added to the capital by 5 hammers [ICON_Production], 5 grains [ICON_Food], 3 bottles [ICON_Science], 3 pianos [ICON_Culture], 12 gold [ICON_Gold] 12 Dove[ICON_Faith].
This city adds 600 [ICON_Gold], all units gain 10 [ICON_Strength] when defending, and gain 10 HP when out of combat.
Ignores the mobility debuff of the terrain, +10 strength when fighting barbarians [ICON_Strength]

Give 1 technology as a gift, heal all units in this city, increase the speed of units in this city by 1 [ICON_Movement], and gain the ability to jump (set to jump 5 spaces), limited to 3 times. [NewLine] Mechanical life can be sustained by the remains produced by the Creator. By inhabiting the ancient machinery, the shackles of death are wiped away. [NewLine] "This is really a happy miscalculation...Sister, I'll be back as soon as I go."
Existing Mono has +1 [ICON_Movement] speed when in friendly territory. Existing units can gain landing ability and healing in this city, limited to 3 times.
The unit attacks the damaged unit with +3 power, which permanently +1 [ICON_Movement] speed for Mono passing through this city.
Units ignore the Impaired Combat Strength debuff.
Gain 500 [ICON_Gold] gold coins and a worker [ICON_Charges] for each city you conquer.
Units can move after attacking. If mobility allows, Mono can attack 3 additional times in one round. Mono escorts units and grants the formation's full [ICON_Movement] movement.
This city can purchase areas, and the cost of purchasing areas and buildings is reduced by 50%. Units within the 9th ring in the city center have +7 [ICON_Strength] strength.
The End of the Dark NightÂ·
Attacking injured units +3 [ICON_Strength] Strength from the Governor
Ignores the hill movement debuff, and attacks garrisoned units with +3 [ICON_Strength] strength.
Ignores the river's Movement [ICON_Movement] and Combat Strength [ICON_Strength] debuffs.

The unique unit Mono ignores the movement debuffs of hills, the movement and combat debuffs of rivers, and has +5 strength when attacking and +3 [ICON_Strength] strength when attacking garrisoned units. A powerful ability can be used when the movement speed reaches 6 or higher [Original One]: +8 [ICON_Movement] movement this round.
Each point of unused [ICON_Movement] movement provides +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.

Two 10-hammer special items: life repair and repair mode, which can increase Mono's movement speed [ICON_Movement], heal [ICON_Damaged] units and give units the ability to jump. [NewLine] People who have been abandoned still take action for the sake of light. Farewell to the ruined garden - the rusty will begins to rattle.
The main fighter comes down to beat someone.

The unique unit, Mono, ignores the mobility debuffs of hills, and the mobility and combat debuffs of rivers. +3 Strength [ICON_Strength] when attacking garrisoned units, +5 Strength [ICON_Strength] when attacking. A powerful ability can be used when the movement speed reaches 6 or higher [Original One]: +8 Movement [ICON_Movement] this round.

It has the characteristic Governor's Final Act of Night's Familiar, Urias. [NewLine] What dominates the mechanical world is decay. The mechanical servant burst into tears. [Let me see it. your will, your heart]

Will I also join the fight? [NewLine] Oh my, this is so nerve-wracking... I am a weak lady and a broken screw. It's painful to force it. [NewLine]Forget it, I have survived so far anyway, so I decided to enjoy the rest of my life.

Mono was one of the earlier sentient beings created by Belfort, but was later abandoned. Equipped with a poetry recital system, she spoke very interestingly and often called herself a "weak woman". When he broke out of the cage, he accidentally learned of his sister's existence and finally found the meaning of his birth. [NewLine] Due to the early type, its own failures will increase with the use of the power of [Primary One]. After many battles to save his sister, the machine was on the verge of death. If not for Urias' intervention, it would have been scrapped during the war.
She is just a weak woman.

A blood-stained descendant monster, longing for the power of will and the pursuit of daylight. Hunger and thirst lead it to wander far away, and to endless visits and challenges. Donât know how to sigh, donât know what to ask for, donât know how to redeem. The storm blew only the waves of battle.
Within the 9th level of the governorâs ability
+7 [ICON_Strength] strength within the range of Governor Urias' ability
